Guys go watch the hentai version in stead cause  episode 3 has better ending than this and I like how in the hentai you choose which ending you want to watch.The author should have not made a happy ending and if he wanted to then should been better than this.Cause honestly I would have taken the route where the guy takes his  girl and they split.Cause this is just retarded ass ending      .But hey it is just a doujin and honestly it's a 3/10 there way better stuff to fap too and hentai is a 6/10.

Brother in law became husband but the child is from the scum and they don't have a child of their own...he really loves Yayoi, doesn't he? or this is just a forced happy ending to calm down the storm of hatred from readers...
If I'm in his position then I can forgive Yayoi for having sex with another guy but for her to give birth to the scum's child and I'm supposed to act as the child's father is not something I can tolerate as it's a reminder of her cheating and the reason why she won't have sex with me anymore.

Why he had to make a happy ending when the whole doujin was full Netorare? There’s no happy ending in these kinds of doujins. The Mc had to abandon her and ruin her social life but preferred to support her and raise her child? Fuck this shity author

I don't like how the author tried to make the ending happy. It actually makes the fucking story delusional. I like ntr. And boku no yayoi san is one of the most popular ones. The henari ended differently. Most people won't be able to handle this considering its middle teir ntr
He got broken and will never again touch Yayoi dude, plus even if she wanted, her body would reject his puny dick.

For clarification, it is definitelt the MC (maybe with Yayoi's help as well) that killed the fucker. Multiple stabs indicate it is an act of revenge. This would also explain why they are visiting MC's brother (Yayoi's ex husband)'s grave. It is a symbolic act of declaring to the dead that vengeance is completed. The fact that the entire family came to visit also indicates a normal relationship.

God damn man I just went full retard didn't I. I guess I was just venting my frustration at this delicately (and masterfully) crafted piece of shit. Damn it Jyogi, I would've abandoned you if it wasn't for your other good works.

It's also not really fair to give MC shit for being a 'cuck' too imo. Kid was clearly developing PTSD and inferiority complex after the shock, while Yayoi was suffering from withdrawal symptoms. I'm pretty sure a lot of other people would wind up either suicidal or being r/cuckhold OPs if this kind of shit happened to them. I guess my main frustration is that they did not seek mental and medical help immediately afterwards (plus some other stupid shit decisions Yayoi make), but given that they seems to be having a normal wedding life now, I guess they sorted their shit out.

Look, this is some truly horrible NTR shit but can we at least acknowledge that the author tried to salvage this fucking mess with a more or less happy endings? It's pretty clear that the MC eventually manned up and killed that fucker when the chance arrived. It's also pretty clear that they're now married with a kid, which means that the chances of MC still bringing friends to fuck Yayoi is pretty low. It's even also implied that the kid could be MC's own due to their same food preference, which is possible since MC fucked Yayoi during her danger period as well.
This is the most pathetic pile of shit this author has created. Why do quality artists turn to shitty NTR/cuckold shit?
Wow! Happy ending now im so full haha
soo... happy end. =.=

Just for this work alone I fucking hate Tsukino Jyogi.  Although others are pretty awesome
